name: Little trouble in the big Oak
name_original: Little trouble in the big Oak
description:
Objectives

Find all 4 missing fairies!
Defeat enemies to grow stronger.
Cast the spells that the fairies provide you.
Pick up buffs that defeated enemies drop.
Find permanent buffs around the world.

Controls ActionKeyMoveRight Mouse ButtonMelee AttackLeft Mouse ButtonActivate Fire FairyQActivate Water FairyWActivate Earth FairyECharge Spell
Left Mouse Button

The longer you charge a spell, the more powerful it will be. Spells have more or less of this, see "Advanced Wizardry" for more information.

Notes

You cannot save your progress.
